nodes.text: Sergeant Ghitter Mannes was a Twi'lek female who served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War during their war against the resurgent Sith Empire.
Stationed on Balmorra, one of the Republic worlds that was invaded by the Empire, Sergeant Mannes tasked a Republic spacer to defend the Republic headquarters from the Colicoids around Bugtown.
Mannes' first name was only listed in the filename for her conversation in the game's text files.
